channel.title: Unlimited X - The Original Unlimited Server
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/313hh74.png[/img]
[b]Unlimited X The Original Unlimited Server[/b]
This project has been in development for quite some time now, around 10 months to a year. I've been developing it with numerous programmers for a while, but we have all dropped out at certain points. I'm currently the only one on the team developing the Server/Client, with forum-side development by Trevor
This project won't be like the others, (Quit after a week, couldn't fix a stability bug, never gets released, and so forth). Although I can't gaurentee I will be updating constantly/managing the thread all the time. I can assure you that development will not stop until it's finished.
[CENTER]Aims & Goals[/CENTER]
[*]A fun, economic, enjoyable skilling & playerkilling server [*]Realistic gameplay [*]Minimum to no glitches or bugs that will ruin the fun of the server [*]No half-assed work such as skills or playerkilling features [*]Proper formulas and calculations [*]Good stability and uptime [*]A hard working staff team, that actually helps players in need and can manage to keep the server and forums under control [*]A nice, and enjoyable community [*]Just something different in all hopes
[CENTER]Latest update: Autocasting Video: [URL=http://"http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=wmdv2o&s=6"]Custom Autocasting System![/URL][/CENTER]
[b]Media:[/b]
[CENTER]MiniGames (Some custom, Some real, all are tweaked to be "custom"). [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2gvqwrl.png[/img]
Main Features (From custom interfaces to real runescape based special attacks). [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2wn7m2q.png[/img]
NPC Clipping [URL=http://"http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=s5z3aq&s=5"]NPC Clipping[/URL]
The clipping isn't that new tiles.put shit, it's my own method. Here's a example of how it's done: [CODE] (This has been modified so it will not work for you, if you can figure out how to get it working you can use it, but you'll need the other methods and the data)
public boolean Unwalkable(int x, int y, int x2, int y2) { for (int i = 0; i < LOADED_OBJECTS; i++) { if (x == ObjectX[i] && y == ObjectY[i]) { return false; } } return true; } (This is not the full code, or how its correctly setup)
it just makes it so the objects and walls and such loaded are unwalkable, although object sizes are not yet implemented. [/CODE]
Realistic Combat (Getting as close as my abilities will allow me to perfect combat). Magic+Melee (Rushing): [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/9uro1l.gif[/img]
Melee to Magic: [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/rsu6ph.gif[/img]
Range to Magic: [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/15g1dw.gif[/img][/CENTER]
Random: [IMG]http://i898.photobucket.com/albums/ac190/TrebaurLul/Interfaces-1.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i898.photobucket.com/albums/ac190/TrebaurLul/Godswords.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i898.photobucket.com/albums/ac190/TrebaurLul/Rushing.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i898.photobucket.com/albums/ac190/TrebaurLul/Penace.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i898.photobucket.com/albums/ac190/TrebaurLul/Lever.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i898.photobucket.com/albums/ac190/TrebaurLul/DragonBow.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i898.photobucket.com/albums/ac190/TrebaurLul/Dharoks.gif[/img]
More coming as I obtain more photos, GIF's and videos.
Credits:
-WhiteFang(Server) -blakeman8192(Server) -TrebaurLul or Xenon or Trevor -Silva or Dakota -Agent str And anyone else who has supported/helped me or that I haven't mentioned.
Old Development:
Update Blog:
12/[B]06[/B]/09 Added Magic Shortbow Special Started Developing a Skulling system Did minor combat adjustments Started BASIC Ranging Defence system, around 20%. Did some cache edits to the client Updated client sprites Added a few emotes to the client Added a few gfx's to the client Started working on a fight pits base Created basic NPC Vs Player combat
12/[B]07[/B]/09 Rewrote special attacks base Added DDS, D Long, Whip, and D Mace specials Started work on magic delays NPC Dialogue added Basic cooking system added VERY basic fishing added, pictures tomorrow.
12/[B]08[/B]/09 Nothing started today, as I was very busy in real life.
12/[B]09[/B]/09 Very nice herblore base added, pictures coming soon.
12/[B]10-18[/B]/09 No Development.
12/[B]19[/B]/09 Thieving base started.
[B]12/20/09 - 2/05/10[/B] NOTE: By saying 'System Completed' I do not mean it's done, I simply mean the way it's all used is completed, not that it's fully done. Fishing system Completed Cooking system Completed Combat system Completed Melee system Completed Magic system Completed Ranging system Completed Quest system Completed Mage Arena miniquest Completed Starter quest Completed Prayer system Completed Combat delays Completed Max hit formula Completed[100%! All correct max hits done for every system, melee, magic, ranging!] Shopping system Completed[Glitch/Dupe proof, tested] Trading system Completed[Glitch/Dupe proof, tested] Npc combat system Completed[Still kind of buggy] Npc vs. Npc combat system Completed[Very buggy still] Slayer system Completed Fletching system Completed Woodcutting system Completed Runecrafting system Completed Mining system Started [/CENTER]

item.title: Unlimited X - The Original Unlimited Server
item.dc:creator: @TrebaurLul TrebaurLul
item.description:
@TrebaurLul wrote:

[CENTER]

Unlimited X
The Original Unlimited Server

This project has been in development for quite some time now, around 10 months to a year. I’ve been developing it with numerous programmers for a while, but we have all dropped out at certain points. I’m currently the only one on the team developing the Server/Client, with forum-side development by Trevor

This project won’t be like the others, (Quit after a week, couldn’t fix a stability bug, never gets released, and so forth). Although I can’t gaurentee I will be updating constantly/managing the thread all the time. I can assure you that development will not stop until it’s finished.

[CENTER]Aims & Goals[/CENTER]

[]A fun, economic, enjoyable skilling & playerkilling server
[]Realistic gameplay
[]Minimum to no glitches or bugs that will ruin the fun of the server
[]No half-assed work such as skills or playerkilling features
[]Proper formulas and calculations
[]Good stability and uptime
[]A hard working staff team, that actually helps players in need and can manage to keep the server and forums under control
[]A nice, and enjoyable community
[*]Just something different in all hopes

[CENTER]Latest update:
Autocasting
Video: Custom Autocasting System![/CENTER]

Media:

[CENTER]MiniGames
(Some custom, Some real, all are tweaked to be “custom”).

2gvqwrl.png734×500

Main Features
(From custom interfaces to real runescape based special attacks).

NPC Clipping
NPC Clipping

The clipping isn’t that new tiles.put shit, it’s my own method. Here’s a example of how it’s done:

[CODE] (This has been modified so it will not work for you,
if you can figure out how to get it working you can use it,
but you’ll need the other methods and the data)

public boolean Unwalkable(int x, int y, int x2, int y2)
{
    for (int i = 0; i < LOADED_OBJECTS; i++)
    {
        if (x == ObjectX[i] && y == ObjectY[i])
        {
            return false;
        }
    }
    return true;
}

(This is not the full code, or how its correctly setup)

it just makes it so the objects and walls and such loaded
are unwalkable, although object sizes are not yet implemented.
[/CODE]

Realistic Combat
(Getting as close as my abilities will allow me to perfect combat).
Magic+Melee (Rushing):

Melee to Magic:

Range to Magic:
[/CENTER]

Random:

More coming as I obtain more photos, GIF’s and videos.

Credits:

-WhiteFang(Server)
-blakeman8192(Server)
-TrebaurLul or Xenon or Trevor
-Silva or Dakota
-Agent str
And anyone else who has supported/helped me or that I haven’t mentioned.

Old Development:

Update Blog:

12/06/09
Added Magic Shortbow Special
Started Developing a Skulling system
Did minor combat adjustments
Started BASIC Ranging Defence system, around 20%.
Did some cache edits to the client
Updated client sprites
Added a few emotes to the client
Added a few gfx’s to the client
Started working on a fight pits base
Created basic NPC Vs Player combat

12/07/09
Rewrote special attacks base
Added DDS, D Long, Whip, and D Mace specials
Started work on magic delays
NPC Dialogue added
Basic cooking system added
VERY basic fishing added, pictures tomorrow.

12/08/09
Nothing started today, as I was very busy in real life.

12/09/09
Very nice herblore base added, pictures coming soon.

12/10-18/09
No Development.

12/19/09
Thieving base started.

12/20/09 - 2/05/10
NOTE: By saying ‘System Completed’ I do not mean it’s done, I simply mean the way it’s all used is completed, not that it’s fully done.
Fishing system Completed
Cooking system Completed
Combat system Completed
Melee system Completed
Magic system Completed
Ranging system Completed
Quest system Completed
Mage Arena miniquest Completed
Starter quest Completed
Prayer system Completed
Combat delays Completed
Max hit formula Completed[100%! All correct max hits done for every system, melee, magic, ranging!]
Shopping system Completed[Glitch/Dupe proof, tested]
Trading system Completed[Glitch/Dupe proof, tested]
Npc combat system Completed[Still kind of buggy]
Npc vs. Npc combat system Completed[Very buggy still]
Slayer system Completed
Fletching system Completed
Woodcutting system Completed
Runecrafting system Completed
Mining system Started
[/CENTER]
